# resumeDownload(fromResumeData:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Resumes a failed or canceled download.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func resumeDownload(fromResumeData resumeData: Data, completionHandler: @escaping @MainActor (WKDownload) -> Void)
```

```swift
@MainActor func resumeDownload(fromResumeData resumeData: Data) async -> WKDownload
```

## Parameters

- **resumeData**: An object with data that you use to resume a failed or canceled download.
- **completionHandler**: A closure the system executes when it has resumed a download.

## Discussion

To receive progress updates, set the delegate of the download object in the completion handler.

## Managing downloads

- **startDownload(using:completionHandler:)**: Starts to download the resource at the URL in the request.
